enhanced_description: Talentpool is an intuitive, configurable, AI-enabled applicant tracking software that has been adopted by enterprises since 2006. Designed for fast-growing lean organizations as well as global and large enterprises, it leverages emerging technologies and an easily-configurable workflow to help recruitment teams make data-driven decisions, attract top talent, and streamline the onboarding process. The software is known for its ease of adoption and integration readiness.
